channel.title: about on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in about on erg home

item.description: eg was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka “John-o”), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The foundation of the consultancy is on Statistical and Psychometric applications. The services provided are delivered within a systems-oriented framework of Organizational Development. The mission of eg includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students and former students contribute to eg’s services via structured contract assignments.
